segments.text: I keep looking back at that boy on the stool; it's truly a perilous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The two-step stool is positioned on the floor, but its legs are all splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to tip over backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched upwards, reaching for the cookies, completely oblivious to the danger beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems very precarious up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a surge of fear for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool goes, he's going down hard, likely hitting the counter or the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors could even cause a nasty bump on the way down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would secure it or help him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling makes me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is not a safe way to get cookies, even if they are delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm dreading the moment it might actually happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR
